MediaStreamTrackEnded_event.summary: The ended event of the interface is fired when playback or streaming has stopped because the end of the media was reached or because no further data is available.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.

-The HTMLMediaElement event
-The HTMLMediaElement event
-The HTMLMediaElement event
-audio
-video
-The HTMLMediaElement event
-The AudioScheduledSourceNode event
